overview: Didier Toubia, NLT SPINEâ€™s CEO has co-founded and held key positions in companies developing innovative medical devices and systems. Prior to NLT SPINE, Mr. Didier Toubia co-founded and served as the CEO of IceCure Medical, a VC-backed fast growing medical device company focused on minimally-invasive treatments of tumors, which successfully went public on the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange in 2011. Prior to IceCure, Mr. Toubia co-founded and led the Business Development efforts of SurgiVision Ltd, an Israeli medical device company developing minimally invasive electro-optical systems for neurosurgery, and served as a Partner at the Life Sciences practice of Cukierman & Co. Investment House Ltd.
